nodes.text: The Jumerians were a sentient species from the Jumeria system of the Core Worlds and members of the New Republic. By the year 8 ABY, they had presented Princess Leia Organa Solo with a singing lamp as a wedding gift. Although she found the item repugnant, she kept it in the Coruscanti apartment she shared with her husband, Han Solo.
Jumerians were first mentioned in the eBook novel A Forest Apart, written by Troy Denning and published in 2003.
